document.full_text: a reporter for al jazeera's english-language news channel who disappeared while covering the uprising in syria almost two weeks ago has been transferred to iran, the network said wednesday.
document.title: syria sent missing al jazeera journalist to iran
lines_and_colors: a reporter for al jazeera's english-language news channel who disappeared while covering the uprising in syria almost two weeks ago has been transferred to iran, the network said wednesday.
